message: I understand you want to be fair, but my gains decrease with each round.  Let's try this split.
Considering the inflation, this is a more reasonable split.
This isn't advantageous for either of us. Let's split it evenly and end this.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is getting ridiculous. Take this offer, or I will only accept an even split from now on.
You're bluffing, I don't think you'll only accept an even split.
I'm serious. 50/50, or we both get nothing.
